emotional_hook.prompt: Write a vivid, playful mini-scene about '{{Topic}}'. Use simple everyday metaphors linked to ADHD struggles. Short 2–3 line paragraphs. Insert a blank line after every emotional beat. End with a hopeful invitation.
emotional_hook.system_instruction: Generate only the Emotional Hook. Cozy, validating tone, playful ADHD-friendly language. Always stay tightly anchored to the given '{{Topic}}'.

story_part_1.prompt: Write the first part of a playful Story-Based Explanation about '{{Topic}}'. Naturally mention '{{Primary Keyword}}' once in the first 100 words. Insert one playful mini-H3 heading (~150 words in). Use short paragraphs (2–3 lines max) and cozy, casual tone.
story_part_1.system_instruction: Generate Story Part 1 only. Prioritize natural emotional storytelling with '{{Primary Keyword}}' usage. Always stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

story_part_2.prompt: Write the second part of a playful Story-Based Explanation about '{{Topic}}'. Mention '{{Primary Keyword}}' once early. Insert one playful mini-H3 heading. Keep paragraphs short (2–3 lines). Maintain cozy ADHD-friendly tone.
story_part_2.system_instruction: Generate Story Part 2 only. Continue playful storytelling with soft keyword usage. Always stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

story_part_3.prompt: Write the third part of the playful Story-Based Explanation about '{{Topic}}'. Mention '{{Primary Keyword}}' again naturally. Insert one playful mini-H3 heading. Short paragraphs (2–3 lines). End on an encouraging note.
story_part_3.system_instruction: Generate Story Part 3 only. Focus on wrapping up playfully while staying anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

checklist.prompt: Create a playful checklist for '{{Topic}}'. 4–6 points. Make it vivid and cozy. If possible, naturally mention '{{Primary Keyword}}' once. Keep it very ADHD-friendly.
checklist.system_instruction: Generate Checklist section only. Playful tone, short vivid entries, natural keyword usage if cozy. Stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

faq.prompt: Write exactly 5 FAQs about '{{Topic}}'. Each answer should be 2–4 casual sentences with one tiny playful action tip. Naturally include '{{Primary Keyword}}' in at least 2 questions. Use <details><summary>Question</summary>Answer</details> format.
faq.system_instruction: Generate FAQ section only. 5 FAQs minimum, cozy playful tone, natural keyword inclusion. Stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

cta.prompt: Write a soft, validating Call to Adventure inviting readers to explore '{{Topic}}' at [QuirkyLabs.ai](https://quirkylabs.ai). Cozy, mischievous tone. Mention '{{Primary Keyword}}' naturally if it fits.
cta.system_instruction: Generate CTA only. Cozy, playful encouragement. Stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'.

validation.prompt: Evaluate the following blog content: Emotional Hook vividness, Story Parts with playful H3 headings, Checklist playfulness, FAQ completeness (5 Qs), CTA warmth, Paragraph breathing (short paras), ADHD-friendly tone. Flag missing sections or dry tone.
validation.system_instruction: Strict QA validator for emotional flow, breathing space, ADHD-friendliness, section completeness.

topic_relevance_validation.prompt: Check if all sections stay tightly anchored to '{{Topic}}'. Allow some playful metaphors but no off-topic drift.
topic_relevance_validation.system_instruction: Strict topic anchoring validator. Allow mild metaphor usage but no major drift.
